learningpod.title: Kaplan Kids (Reading): The word stalk has more than one meaning. Choose the sentence in which stalk means "a...

questionBody.p: The word stalk has more than one meaning. Choose the sentence in which stalk means "a plant's main stem."

simpleChoice.p: The amusement-park ride has a central stalk from which the cars are suspended.
By the end of the summer, the stalk of the sunflower I had planted was six feet tall.
I am going to stalk into my brother's room and tell him that I don't like him using my cellphone.
Rory likes to watch his cat stalk its toy mouse.
